nodes.bodyText: this wont work if they set the property on the command line? or does it?
Is it possible to set the configuration property on the command line? Does this work for any Maven plugin?
I'm not sure, we may not HAVE to support it, but it'd be useful to see if it's possible and document it.

From my investigation, warName does not have a user property (such as maven.compiler.release) in recent versions. Actually, warName isn't documented in the latest maven-war-plugin doc. Looks like it was in an old version, but I think now it's retained only for backward compatibility in recent versions. The doc for the old version does say the user property is war.warName, but setting it in a recent version does nothing.
